alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Norfolk; City of Portsmouth; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued July 19 at 4:43PM EDT until July 19 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 517 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES HERTFORD NORTHAMPTON PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, BOWERS HILL, BRYANTOWN, CAPE COLONY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EAGLETOWN, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, FENTRESS, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GATESVILLE, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBRIER, GUM FORKS, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORSESHOE, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, RICH SQUARE, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, VULTARE, AND WINDSOR.
